SELECT admission.admission_nm, exam.exam_cd, exam.type_nm, exam.exam_nm, hall.hall_cd, hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm, sheet.scorer_nm, sheet.sheet_no, sheet.reg_dttm, sheet.cancel_dttm FROM sheet INNER JOIN exam ON exam.exam_cd = sheet.exam_cd INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = exam.admission_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = sheet.hall_cd
AND admission.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions}) AND sheet.cancel_dttm IS NOT NULL AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND sheet.sheet_no = #{param.sheetNo} AND sheet.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'

SELECT admission.admission_nm, exam.exam_cd, exam.type_nm, exam.exam_nm, examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.dept_nm, examinee.major_nm, hall.hall_cd, hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm, exam_map.virt_no, exam_map.hall_date AS exam_date, a.scorer_nm, a.update_cnt FROM ( SELECT score_log.exam_cd, score_log.hall_cd, score_log.virt_no, score_log.scorer_nm, count(*) - 1 AS update_cnt FROM score_log WHERE score_log.sheet_no IS NULL GROUP BY score_log.exam_cd, score_log.hall_cd, score_log.virt_no, score_log.scorer_nm HAVING count(*) > 1 ) a INNER JOIN exam_map ON a.exam_cd = exam_map.exam_cd AND a.hall_cd = exam_map.hall_cd AND a.virt_no = exam_map.virt_no INNER JOIN exam ON exam_map.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd INNER JOIN hall ON exam_map.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON exam_map.examinee_cd = examinee.examinee_cd INNER JOIN admission ON exam.admission_cd = admission.admission_cd
AND admission.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions}) AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND exam_map.hall_date = #{param.examDate} AND examinee.major_nm = #{param.majorNm} AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND score_log.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'

SELECT DISTINCT virt_no, score01, score02, score03, score04, score05 , score06, score07, score08, score09, score10, scorer_nm , date_format(score_dttm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS rescore_dttm FROM score_log
AND score_log.sheet_no IS NULL
AND score_log.virt_no LIKE '%' #{param.virtNo} '%' AND score_log.scorer_nm = #{param.scorerNm}
ORDER BY rescore_dttm
SELECT max(cnt) FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM item GROUP BY exam_cd ) a
